title: Reflections upon some passages in a book, entitled reflections upon the conduct of human life. With reference to the study of learning and knowledge. By Edmund Elys.
author: Elys, Edmund, ca. 1634-ca. 1707.
notes: A reply to: Norris, John.  Reflections upon the conduct of human life, with reference to the study of learning and knowledge.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
